meanings.definition: A member of a dark-skinned group of peoples originally native to Africa.
meanings.sent1: The negro greeted his friends with a warm smile.
meanings.sent2: The museum displayed artifacts from the life of a negro tribe.
meanings.sent3: The curious monkey imitated the movements of the playful negro.
meanings.sent4: In the vast savanna, the lion stood out among the grazing negroes.
meanings.sent5: The storyteller captivated the children with tales of brave negro warriors.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to black people.
meanings.sent1: The artist used bold negro colors in his painting.
meanings.sent2: The community celebrated Negro History Month with various events.
meanings.sent3: The old movie showcased the glamorous fashion of the 1950s negro stars.
meanings.sent4: The night sky was a blanket of stars, with the moon shining on the negro city.
meanings.sent5: The spicy aroma of the negro cuisine filled the kitchen during the cooking competition.
